source_objects.description: From hair styles to makeup tips, fashion tips to ageless secrets, welcome to the ultimate place for beauty & makeup courses.
source_objects.title: Beauty & Makeup

items.title: Natural Beauty: How to Make Lotions, Creams and Body Butters
items.headline: How to create your own natural skincare lotions harnessing the power of healing plants for natural beauty and wellness
objectives_summary: You will know how to formulate and make your own lotions creams and body butters
You will know how to create your own lotion cream and body butter recipes
You  will know how to choose the right carrier oil for making lotion specific to your skin's needs.

items.title: Makeup Artistry Basic to Masterclass , makeup course
items.headline: Daily make up and evening makeup on Different skin tones, Eye shape , online makeup courses , makeup artist
objectives_summary: Apply a day to evening Make Up on Yourself and later on your Clients with different Facial Features flawlessly and correct
Masterclass : Learn the latest Make Up looks ! From Soft Decent to Dramatic, Glamorous, Oriental & Bridal Looks on international models
Skin types & how to prepare and prime the perfect Base for every skin

items.title: Natural Skincare :: Luscious herbal Recipes for Younger Skin
items.headline: Easily make superior & safe skin care using natural herbs and botanicals from herbalism. Beauty at its best!
objectives_summary: Deeply nourish the skin for long-term benefits so you look your best today and years from now
Understand the most beneficial and effective ingredients for healthy, vibrant skin
Easy step-by-step instructions and simple recipes for your mature or dry skin

items.title: Learn How to Apply Classic Eyelash Extensions
items.headline: Beginner Classic Eyelash Extension Course
objectives_summary: History of Eyelashes
Tools of the trade
How to create eyelash styles

eyebrow shaping
beauty tips

items.title: Natural Beauty: How to Create Natural Skincare Face Oils
items.headline: Make easy and effective natural skin care face oils using essential oils, carrier oils and basic herbalism concepts
objectives_summary: How to determine your skin type and personality.
How to find the right carrier oil for you face.
How to find the best essential oils for your skin type.

items.title: Expert Nail Technician Course - Become a SuperStar Nail Tech
items.headline: Learn how to do stunning designs, sculpt durable nails and market your nail business!
objectives_summary: Essential knowledge on nail structure and preparation
Advanced knowledge of colour combination, composition
Stunning designs including ombre, textured look, line art and more

items.title: Makeup: Effortless Makeup for Real Women
items.headline: A comprehensive guide on creating flawless looking makeup for every day, occasion, budget and time limits.
objectives_summary: Apply three full makeup looks - day, evening and night
Feel confident choosing the perfect products for all ages and skin types
Do a full makeup look within a frantic busy schedule

items.headline: Danessa Myricks teaches the art of Face Contouring, using the 4 Core Concepts and extensive step-by-step demonstration.
objectives_summary: By the end of this course you will be able to sculpt and reshape faces
Create flawless, natural finishes on the skin
Use tone and texture to enhance features or diminish imperfection

Become a master at applying your own makeup at home, creating different effects and how to achieve different looks.

items.title: Natural Beauty:  Natural Cosmetic Preservation
items.headline: Learn how to use preservatives to protect your natural skincare formulations and make your skincare products safe
objectives_summary: How to understand the challenging world of skincare formulation preservatives
How to select the right preservative for your skincare formulations
How to make your skincare formulations and products safe
